searchStudies

public java.util.List<Study> searchStudies(StudyQuery studyQuery)
Wil search the studies, then returns a list of reduced studies.

Parameters:
studyQuery - - The query
Returns:
A list of reduced study objects having (id, short title and primaryIdentifier).

addRule

public java.lang.String addRule()
This will access the spring managed object from the session (RuleSet) and will update the object with Condition. Then will forward to a jsp to get the html for that condition and will return that.

matchOrganization

public java.util.List<Organization> matchOrganization(java.lang.String text)
This method will be called to fetch the sponsors. It was added as we needed the ID to be displayed in the returned values. Earlier only the name of the organization was displayed.

Parameters:
text -
Returns:
List Note:- Used by selectRuleType.jsp
